title: Elementary – Cycle 2 – Progression of Learning - Science and Technology (2009)
subject: Mathematics, Science and Technology

7AA5C01276394E80BE325B8D48288545.description: Recognizes that the quantity of the matter remains the same once a change has occurred (e.g. 50 ml of water in a saucer or a glass, whole piece of chalk or ground chalk, flattened piece of modelling clay or a ball of modelling clay)

46E68AD63F624FB88EB5BF010FE48657.description: Classifies materials (e.g. fabrics, sponges, papers) according to their degree of absorption

059878E286DD449BB17F159B108D20F2.description: Classifies objects according to their properties (e.g. colour, shape, size, texture, smell
